_comment: Created by rreed on 25/05/2017 13:34:17 using v2.7
title: How has the number of community nurses changed?
analysis_commentary:
Despite the increase in the overall numbers of qualified nursing, midwifery and health visiting staff, this has not been a pattern uniformly seen across all types of nurse. For example, the number of community FTE nurses fell from 41,351 in September 2009 to 35,489 in January 2017, a decrease of just over 14%.

Updated April 2017.
